comment: He is a great teacher who cares about the topics that he teaches. the only complaint that I have is that his tests and homework are absurdly hard. His exams are probably twice as hard as his lectures and homework and require mastery over the topics that he teaches. Great guy, great class, but hard

He is very easy to follow in lecture. He is old school, writes on the board, and labors to make sure that the students understand. He makes the class content enjoyable and loves the subject (Control Systems).

I took this async online, and everything was graded more than fairly. If you are strong in linear algebra, it's not too hard. His accent was sometimes a barrier to me, but I found that if you speed up his lecture videos he becomes much easier to understand. Didn't really interact with him all that much.
I did not subtract by one on a 4 question test and got 16 points taken off.
Best professor ever. Dr. Wang is really amazing.

He is one of the best professors in Engineering department. He gives clear lectures with plenty of practical examples. Not many work load and homework. The best thing is his exams and finals are all open book test! The only time-consuming work is the group project and its presentation.
I give Dr.Wang five star. He is the best professor (not one of) in EE and MTRE department.
Great teacher do some work and you will get a decent grade

Great guy who is very interested in the subject.  Class is only based on theory.. Go into the test and it is all real life applications. Very difficult to turn his notes into a good grade.  The book is also only theory. Not an easy A/B class if you need it for GPA.

Great Professor. He gives very good lectures with sufficient explanations for every chapter in the book. He is also a very friendly person. I would love to take Dr. Wang for more classes in future. He is surely one of the best professors in EE and MTRE department.
Great and very dedicated Professor. Would definitely recommend him. Very objective and passionate about the subject.

This is an EXCELLENT teacher! He cares about the subject he is teaching, students progress, and is very fair. He'll tell you if it's an easy or difficult class, believe him! Go to class and do the work...you will learn the material! I'm looking forward to all other classes with him, again, EXCELLENT teacher!

Probably the best professor in Mechatronics at SPSU.  His teaching style is very methodical, and his notes are basicly the important highlights of the textbooks he uses.  His expectations are very clear and reflected on the exams.  Dr. Wang is also very passionate about robotics, which makes classtime enjoyable.
Hard time with English. Overall good professor and reasonable grader. Lets you use cheat sheets on tests and gives a good review for the final.
